statements: SELECT * FROM defective_items;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM defective_items WHERE is_defective = TRUE;
SELECT item_name, repair_cost FROM defective_items WHERE repair_cost > 100;
SELECT * FROM defective_items WHERE item_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT item_id, is_defective FROM defective_items ORDER BY is_defective DESC, item_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM defective_items WHERE is_defective = TRUE;
SELECT item_name, repair_cost FROM defective_items WHERE repair_cost > 1000 ORDER BY repair_cost DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, repair_cost FROM defective_items WHERE is_defective = TRUE AND repair_cost BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM defective_items WHERE item_name LIKE '%keyboard%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM defective_items WHERE is_defective = TRUE;
SELECT id, item_name, department FROM defective_items;
SELECT repair_id, repair_date, repair_engineer FROM repair_history;
SELECT item_name, department, repair_cost FROM defective_items;
SELECT item_name, department FROM defective_items WHERE repair_cost > 100;
SELECT * FROM repair_history ORDER BY repair_date DESC;
SELECT id, item_name, department, defect_description, repair_cost FROM defective_items WHERE department = 'Electronics' ORDER BY repair_cost DESC;

SELECT repair_id, repair_date, item_name, repair_description, repair_engineer FROM repair_history JOIN defective_items ON repair_history.item_id = defective_items.id WHERE repair_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY repair_date ASC;
SELECT item_name, department, COUNT(*) AS total_defects FROM defective_items GROUP BY item_name, department HAVING total_defects > 2;
SELECT department, AVG(repair_cost) AS avg_repair_cost FROM defective_items GROUP BY department ORDER BY avg_repair_cost DESC;
SELECT item_name, defect_description FROM defective_items WHERE defect_description LIKE '%crack%' OR defect_description LIKE '%broken%';
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM DefectiveItems;
SELECT * FROM RepairHistory WHERE repair_date > NOW();
SELECT DISTINCT repair_option FROM DefectiveItems;
SELECT item_id, defect_description, repair_option FROM DefectiveItems WHERE repair_option = 'Replace';
SELECT item_id, repair_date FROM RepairHistory ORDER BY repair_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM DefectiveItems ORDER BY item_name ASC, defect_description DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT item_name, repair_option, defect_description FROM DefectiveItems WHERE item_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM RepairHistory WHERE repair_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY repair_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT DefectiveItems.item_name, DisposalLog.disposal_date FROM DefectiveItems INNER JOIN DisposalLog ON DefectiveItems.item_id = DisposalLog.item_id WHERE DisposalLog.disposal_reason = 'Faulty' ORDER BY DisposalLog.disposal_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT DefectiveItems.item_name, RepairHistory.repair_date, RepairHistory.repair_details FROM DefectiveItems LEFT JOIN RepairHistory ON DefectiveItems.item_id = RepairHistory.item_id ORDER BY RepairHistory.repair_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM defective_items;
SELECT item_name, manufacturer FROM defective_items WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT defect_description FROM defective_items WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT * FROM repair_records ORDER BY repair_date DESC;
SELECT repair_description, technician_name FROM repair_records WHERE technician_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM defective_items WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT item_id, item_name, manufacturer FROM defective_items WHERE defect_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM repair_records ORDER BY repair_date DESC, technician_name ASC;
SELECT r.record_id, r.repair_date, r.repair_description, t.technician_name FROM repair_records r INNER JOIN repair_technicians t ON r.technician_name = t.technician_name;

SELECT item_name, COUNT(record_id) AS repair_count FROM defective_items LEFT JOIN repair_records ON defective_items.item_id = repair_records.item_id GROUP BY item_name HAVING repair_count > 2 ORDER BY repair_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM DefectiveItems
SELECT item_name, repair_cost FROM DefectiveItems ORDER BY repair_cost DESC
SELECT category_name FROM ItemCategories WHERE category_id = 1
SELECT status_name FROM ItemStatus WHERE status_name LIKE '%Pending%'
SELECT item_id, repair_date, repaired_by FROM RepairHistory WHERE repair_cost > 100
SELECT * FROM DefectiveItems;
SELECT item_name, defect_description, repair_cost FROM DefectiveItems;
SELECT category_name FROM ItemCategories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, repair_cost FROM DefectiveItems WHERE repair_cost > 1000 ORDER BY repair_cost DESC;

SELECT item_name, repair_cost, repair_date, repaired_by FROM DefectiveItems INNER JOIN RepairHistory ON DefectiveItems.id = RepairHistory.item_id WHERE repair_cost IS NOT NULL ORDER BY repair_date DESC;
